modName: Drow Armor Set - various color variants
summary: a small recolor for the awesome Drow Armor Set by newermind43
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Hello everyone :)
Since i totally love the Drow Armor Set by newermind43, i tried to make a simple recolor adding small red parts to make it stand out a bit more. Initially i made this just for fun for my Drow character Vierna, but some users convinced me to upload it here on nexus. :)

As i said, this mod is a simple recolor of the already awesome Drow Armor Set by newermind43. 
This mod will replace the major armor components, for both male and female so, to use this mod, [color=#8AFB17]you will need the original Drow Armor.[/color]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8206/8246992306_1a8c6fe86c_c.jpg[/img]

[color=#F62217]Possible Issue:[/color]
The colored parts, in your game, could be a bit different compared to mine depending on your ENB, lighting mods or even if you play vanilla.
i presonally, and actually, use:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39013/]Kountervibe ENB Extensive[/url] (pics on Files page)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828/]Bleak ENB[/url] (other pics)

[color=#F62217]manual installation:[/color]
- extract the downloaded archive in a temporary folder
- copy the texture folder
- paste the texture folder inside your skyrim\\data folder
( program file (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\ )
- click YES when you are asked to overwrite

[color=#F62217]NMM Installation:[/color]
- click the green button
- click NO when you are asked to \"update\"
- click YES when you are asked to overwrite

[color=#F62217]Required Mods:[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27054]Drow Armor Set[/url]

[color=#F62217]Credits:[/color]
- newermind43 for creating the awesome Drow Armor Set and those detailed textures
- Sharpener - armor is based on his [url=http://www.deviantart.com/morelikethis/118346032]photos[/url]
- all my frieds around the nexus :D
[/center]
author: TomAraya
